name: Ivan "Iron Man" Stewart's Super Off Road
name_original: Ivan "Iron Man" Stewart's Super Off Road
description:
Ivan "Iron Man" Stewart's Super Off Road is a racing-arcade game developed by Graftgold and Leland. It was originally released in 1990. Virgin Mastertronic published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Ivan "Iron Man" Stewart's Super Off Road is available on NES and PC.
